Reviews.Title: Terrific Buy
Reviews.Author: tonya
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for our trip to Walt Disney World in June.  This camera takes the best pictures.  I love using the vivid selection for my pictures.  The colors come out so bright and vibrant, they just look amazing.  Background lights at night look so beautiful, we have so many pictures from our trip to develop, our kids will have wonderful scrap books for their children to come!!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: J. Pliler "zuuka"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of shopping before deciding on this camera. They give you a lot of extras which I appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Carmera
Reviews.Author: Mark Jones
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife to use as we are new grandparent.  She really liked the movie mode.  Very compact.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 MP Image Sensor, DIGIC 4 Image Processor, 8x Optical Zoom, 28mm Wide-Angle lens
720p HD video recording with a dedicated movie button
Smart AUTO with 32 predefined shooting situations, Intelligent IS with six modes to optimize image stabilization
3-inch LCD display
Help Button provides simple explanations and easy controls of your settings
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A4000 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Red) + 8GB Accessory Kit
